thread.title: Early voting begins today: Here are all metro New Orleans locations
thread.title_full: Early voting begins today: Here are all metro New Orleans locations | NOLA.com

author: Manuel Torres, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune.
title: Early voting begins today: Here are all metro New Orleans locations
text:
Early voting starts Saturday (Oct. 10) for Louisiana's Oct. 24 th election, with early voters able to cast ballots until Oct. 17, except Sunday.
Below are all locations to vote early across metro New Orleans. Hours are from 8:30 a.m. to 6 p.m.
The ballot includes statewide and local offices, from governor and treasurer to parish presidents, sheriffs and legislative races. Four constitutional amendments also are on the ballot. View a sample ballot from the Secretary of State's website.
NEW ORLEANS
City Hall, 1300 Perdido Street, Room 1W24.
Algiers Courthouse, 225 Morgan Street, Room 105.
Chef Menteur Voting Machine Warehouse, 8870 Chef Menteur Highway.
Lake Vista Community Center, 6500 Spanish Fort Blvd.
JEFFERSON PARISH
East bank, Joe S. Yenni Building, 1221 Elmwood Park Blvd., Suite 502, in Elmwood.
Kenner, 408 Minor St.
West Bank, Charles Odom Building, 5001 Westbank Expressway, Suite C-2, in Marrero.
Grand Isle will have an office open only one day, Monday (Oct. 12), at the Grand Isle Multiplex, 3101 Louisiana 1, from 10 a.m. to noon and 1 p.m. to 3 p.m.
ST. TAMMANY PARISH
Covington, 601 N. Jefferson Avenue, St. Tammany Justice Center Parking Garage across from the Justice Center.
Slidell, The Towers Building, 520 Old Spanish Trail, first floor conference training area.
Mandeville, 21454 Koop Drive, Building B (second building on left).
ST. BERNARD PARISH
Registrar of voters' office, Parish Government Complex, 8201 W. Judge Perez Drive, Room 104.
ST. CHARLES PARISH
West bank, Courthouse in Hahnville, 15045 River Road.
East bank, Artebury Building, 14564 River Road, in New Sarpy.
ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST
West bank, Edgard Courthouse, 2393 River Road.
East bank, Percy Hebert Building, 1801 W. Airline Highway, in LaPlace.
PLAQUEMINES PARISH
Registrar of voters' office, Parish Government Building, 28028 Hwy. 23, in Port Sulphur.
Belle Chasse Library, 8442 Hwy. 23.
A Davant location will be open only Saturdays, Oct. 10 and 17, at the Rev. Pwercy M. Griffin Community Center, 15577 Hwy. 39, in Davant.
